channel.title: After Black Mesa?
channel.description: Does Crowbar Collective have any future plans for games once you're all completely finished with Black Mesa?

item.title: After Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: Flavrans
item.description:
Actually, an official source said they plan to remake Pong in UE6. Another thing that’s on the table is to create a new genre called Plug Puzzle Games.

Joking aside, the devs have indicated that they are going to work on an original IP, and it’s going to be on a modern engine.

Read full topic

item.title: After Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
I’ve heard from sources that may exist that they’re gonna remake Pacman next.

Read full topic
